profile.title: Bayanin Mai amfani
profile.mustLogin: Dole ne ka shiga don ganin saituna.
profile.allowExplicitContent: Ba da damar abun cikin batsa
profile.saveError: Kuskure: Ba a iya ajiye saituna ba
profile.noPrivateKey: Babu maɓallin sirri a wannan na’ura don a fitar.
profile.setBackupPassword: Saita kalmar sirri don ɓoye ajiyar ka:
profile.backupDownloaded: An sauke ajiyar da aka ɓoye.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Shigar da kalmar sirri na wannan ajiya:
profile.importSuccess: An shigo da maɓallin sirri zuwa wannan na’ura.
profile.importFailed: An kasa shigo da maɓalli (kalmar sirri ba daidai ba ko fayil ya lalace).
profile.keysRotated: An ƙirƙiri sabon ma’aurin maɓalli kuma an loda jama’i.
profile.importKey: Shigo da ajiyar maɓalli da aka ɓoye
profile.keyDisclaimer: Maɓallin sirrinka baya barin wannan na’ura. Fitar da kwafin da aka ɓoye da kalmar sirri don dawo da shi a wata na’ura.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kana a Kyauta — yi amfani da Zaɓuɓɓukan Rana/Wata a ƙasa. Sabunta don buɗe ƙarin jigogi.
profile.backupTitle: Ajiyoyin da aka ɓoye & Daidaita Na’ura
profile.backupDesc: Ƙirƙiri ajiyoyi da aka ɓoye da kalmar sirri, sannan ka dawo da su a wata na’ura don daidaitawa.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Dunna idan app bai mayar da hankali ba
profile.notifyOnCopy: Faɗar min idan an kwafi saƙona
profile.loadFailed: An kasa loda bayanin mai amfani
profile.followHint: Labarinsu zai bayyana a Rukunin Masu Bi idan suka yi ɗora wa Masu Bi (ko Jama’a).
profile.userNotFound: Ba a samu mai amfani ba
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Wani abu ya tafi ba daidai ba a wannan sashi.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tura kira da saƙon shigowa zuwa wayarka ko imel ɗinka da aka tabbatar. Fitarwa na iya nuna lambar Chatforia ɗinka.
profile.errE164: Shigar da sahihin lambar waya ta E.164 (misali +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Zaɓi akalla manufa ɗaya (waya ko imel).
profile.errQuietHours: Lokutan shiru dole su kasance tsakanin 0 zuwa 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Zaɓi rubutu ko ɗakin hira don farawa

status.filesNote: Har zuwa fayil 5. Tsohuwa ƙarewa awa 24.

auth.headline: Sakon aminci, na duniya, da fassara nan take
auth.description: Karewa-zuwa-karewa, fassarar AI, saƙonnin ɓacewa, da kiran murya/bidiyo.

feature.privacy: Sirri na farko. Bayananka naka ne.

auth.keepSignedIn: Ci gaba da kasancewa a ciki
auth.desktopTip: A kan kwamfuta? Duba da wayarka don samun app.
auth.subhead: Saƙonni masu zaman kansu, da aka ɓoye, kuma an fassara — nan take.
auth.tip: Za ka iya amfani da Chatforia a kowace na’ura — ko ka sauke app don kwarewa mafi kyau.
auth.scanHint: Duba don sauke app ko buɗe a burauza.

press.title: Jarida
press.contact: Don tambayoyin jarida, tuntube mu a press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Don tambayoyin jarida, tuntube mu a press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia manzo ne mai tsaro tare da fassara nan take da karewa-zuwa-karewa, an ƙera shi don sauƙaƙe tattaunawar duniya cikin sirri da sauƙi.
press.assetsText: Loguna, hotunan allo, da hotunan samfur (sunan nan ba da jimawa ba).

careers.title: Ayyuka
careers.intro: Ƙaramar ƙungiya ce muke gina manzo na duniya mai sirri. Idan kana kula da karewa, sauƙaƙa amfani, da UI mai daɗi, muna son jin daga gare ka.
careers.openRoles: Buɗaɗɗun matsayi: Injiniya (Cikakken tsari, iOS, Android), Samfuri, Tallafi.

about.title: Game da Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia manzo ne mai harsuna da yawa, da karewa-zuwa-karewa, fassara nan take, da kiran murya/bidiyo. Manufarmu: haɗa mutane—cikin tsaro, sirri, kuma a ko wane harshe.

values.access: Dama ga kowa: Fassara kai tsaye harsuna 100+.
values.control: Iko: Saƙonnin ɓacewa & tabbacin karatu suna zaɓi ne.

about.howDescription: Ana ɓoye saƙonni a na’urarka kafin su fita. Fassara, ajiyoyi, da daidaitawar na’ura an tsara su don rage abin da sabar mu za ta iya gani.

advertise.title: Tallata tare da Chatforia
advertise.description: Kai ga masu amfani da saƙo cikin natsuwa ta wuraren talla masu kyau. Muna da banner a wurare masu gani, haɗin gwiwar tallafi, da tallan gida. Masu biyan Premium ba sa ganin tallace-tallace.

adsense.withPubId: A halin yanzu muna amfani da Google AdSense. Idan kana son niyya ta Google Ads, yi amfani da lambar mai bugawa {{pubId}} ka nemi managed placement a rukunin da ke ƙasa. Haka kuma ana samun tallafin kai tsaye—yi amfani da fom.
adsense.noPubId: A halin yanzu muna amfani da Google AdSense. Haka kuma ana samun tallafin kai tsaye—yi amfani da fom a ƙasa.

advertise.noPlacements: Babu wurare da aka saita tukuna. Ƙara su a ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Zagawa akai-akai da ɗaukar lokaci a UI na hira
why.brandSafe: Tsare-tsaren da ba sa damun mai amfani; iyakance yawan bayyana
why.deals: Ma’amaloli kai tsaye ko ta AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Na gode! Tambayarka na kan hanya. Za mu biyo baya nan ba da jimawa ba.
form.successToast: Na gode! Za mu tuntuɓe ka nan kusa.
form.mailtoInfo: Ana buɗe abokin imel ɗinka don aika tambayar…
form.messageLabel: Faɗa mana game da kamfen ɗinka

legal.disclaimerStart: Ta hanyar tura fom, kana yarda da

upgrade.title: Sabunta
upgrade.subtitle: Zaɓi shirin da ya dace: Plus ba tare da talla ba, ko Premium don cikakkun fasali.

features.plusAll: Duk abin da ke cikin Plus

features.allPremium: Duk abin da ke cikin Premium

gettingStarted.title: Fara Amfani
gettingStarted.subtitle: Sabon mai amfani da Chatforia? Wannan jagora zai nuna muhimmai don fara aiki cikin mintuna.

alert.text: Za mu faɗaɗa wannan jagora yayin da muke ƙaddamar da sababbin fasali. Idan wani abu ya ɓata, sanar da mu ta

section2.title: 2) Fara hira
section2.item1: Ƙirƙiri DM ko Rukuni ka aika saƙonka na farko.
section2.item2: Yi amfani da fassara nan take don hira a harsuna 100+.
section2.item3: Gwada saƙonnin ɓacewa da tabbacin karatu a Profile → Sirri.

section3.title: 3) Ƙara zurfi
section3.item2Part1: Haɗa ƙarin na’urori ka saita ajiyar da aka ɓoye a

account.q: Ta yaya zan ƙirƙira ko dawo da asusu?
account.a: Sauke app ko yi amfani da yanar gizo, danna “Ƙirƙiri asusu”, tabbatar da imel/waya. Don dawo da shi, yi “Ka manta kalmar sirri”.

privacy.a: Eh. Saƙonni da kira ana ɓoye su daga ƙarshe zuwa ƙarshe ta tsohuwa. Kai da mai karɓa kaɗai za ku iya karantawa.

translate.q: Ta yaya fassara nan take ke aiki?
translate.a: Kunna “Fassara kai tsaye” a Saituna → Kamanni & Harshe. Muna fassara a kan na’ura idan ana goyon baya, in ba haka ba ta API masu tsaro tare da ƙaramin bayanan metadata.

contact.a: Tura mana imel a support@chatforia.com. Ƙara hotunan allo da sigar app ɗinka.

contact.title: Tuntuɓe Mu
contact.successMsg: Na gode — ƙungiyarmu za ta amsa ta imel.
contact.errorSend: An kasa aika. Don Allah a yi imel zuwa support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Wannan Manufar Sirri tana bayanin yadda Chatforia (“mu”) ke tattarawa, amfani, da rabon bayanai lokacin amfani da aikace-aikacenmu da ayyuka. Muna ƙera Chatforia ne don rage bayanan da za mu iya samu.

infoWeCollect.title: Bayanan da muke tattarawa
infoWeCollect.account: Bayanan asusu (misali, imel/waya) don ƙirƙira da kare asusunka.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Abun ciki da aka ɓoye (saƙonni/kira) ana karewa-zuwa-karewa; ba za mu iya karanta shi ba.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Bayanan gyara/amfani kamar log na faɗuwa, nau’in na’ura, ko ɗan ƙididdiga don ingantawa.

howWeUse.title: Yadda muke amfani da bayanai
howWeUse.provide: Bayarwa da tsaron sabis (shiga, gano spam/azzalumi).

sharing.title: Raba bayanai
sharing.body: Ba ma sayar da bayanan sirri. Muna iya raba ƙaramin bayani da masu aiwatarwa (misali, tura turawa, ƙididdiga) ƙarƙashin kwangila mai tsauri.

rights.title: Haƙƙinka
rights.body: Dangane da yankinka (misali, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), za ka iya neman samun dama, gyarawa, gogewa, ko ficewa daga wasu sarrafawa. Tuntuɓa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ajiyar bayanai & tsaro
retention.body: Muna riƙe abin da ake buƙata kawai don gudanar da sabis kuma muna amfani da tsaro na masana’antu. Ba za mu iya warware E2E ba.

children.title: Yara
children.body: Chatforia ba ya nufin yara ƙasa da 13 (ko yadda dokarka ta ƙasa ta buƙata).

changes.title: Canje-canje
changes.body: Za mu wallafa sabuntawa a nan mu sabunta ranar “An sabunta ƙarshe”.

intro.body: Ta amfani da Chatforia kana yarda da waɗannan Sharuɗɗa. Idan ba ka yarda ba, kada ka yi amfani da sabis ɗin.

accounts.title: Asusu
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Bayar da ingantaccen bayani kuma ka kare bayanan shiga.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Kai ne ke da alhakin abin da aka yi da asusunka.

acceptableUse.title: Amfani mai kyau
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Kada a yi amfani da abun haram, cin zarafi, ko karya haƙƙi; babu spam ko amfani ta atomatik mara izini.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Za mu iya dakatar/ƙare asusu idan aka karya ƙa’idoji.

yourContent.title: Abun cikin ka
yourContent.body: Kana da haƙƙi a kan abin da ka ƙirƙira. Kana ba mu haƙƙin da ake buƙata don aiki da sabis (misali, isarwa, ajiya, fassara).

disclaimer.title: Bayani & alhaki
disclaimer.body: Ana ba da sabis “kamar yadda yake” ba tare da garanti ba. Muddin doka ta yarda, Chatforia ba ta da alhaki kan asara mai ɗaurewa kai tsaye ko na gaba.

changes.title: Canje-canje
changes.body: Za mu iya sabunta waɗannan sharuɗɗa; cigaba da amfani bayan sabuntawa na nufin yarda.

doNotSell.title: Kada a Siyar ko Raba Bayanaina
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ba ya sayar da bayanan sirri. Mutanen California har yanzu na iya tura buƙata ƙarƙashin CPRA ta maballin da ke ƙasa.

cookies.title: Saitunan Kukis
cookies.body: Chatforia na amfani da kukis kaɗan (misali, zaman, tsaro). Ba ma amfani da kukis na talla na ɓangare na uku. Sarrafa kukis ta saitunan burauzarka.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: An kasa loda matsayin lambar waya.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ba a ba ka lamba ba. Zaɓi ta lambar yanki don fara aika saƙonni.

startChatModal.title: Fara hira
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Rubuta suna, sunan mai amfani, waya, ko imel…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Fara hira da waɗanda aka zaɓa
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Nema da sunan mai amfani ko waya
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Rubuta sunan mai amfani ko waya sannan danna Nema.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Zaɓi akalla mai karɓa guda ɗaya.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Shigar da waya/imel za su kasance bayan ka ajiye su a matsayin lambobi.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: An kasa farawa da waɗanda aka zaɓa.

sounds.freeNotice: Kana a Kyauta — sautunan Premium ana nuna su amma an kulle. Sabunta don buɗe duk.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Wannan fasalin yana buƙatar shirin Premium.

aiSettings.title: Saitunan AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Sarrafa fassara, amsoshi masu kaifin basira, da amsar ForiaBot ta atomatik.
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Nuna rubutun asali a gefen fassara
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Aika saƙonnin da aka karɓa na baya (da aka tsarkake) zuwa AI don shawarwarin amsa masu sauri.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Rufe kalmomin batsa a shawarwarin AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Idan a kunne, shawarwarin da AI ta dawo za su rufe kalmomin da aka yi wa alama
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Kunna amsa kai tsaye idan ina mashagula
aiSettings.translateTagged: Sai idan an yi @translated ko an yi alama

accessibilitySettings.title: Sauƙaƙa Amfani & Faɗakarwa
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Zaɓuɓɓuka don sauƙaƙa amfani da Chatforia ba tare da dogaro da sauti ba.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Yana farawa da girman al’ada. Ƙara idan kana son rubutu ya fi girma.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Faɗakarwa na gani don saƙonni & kira
Nuna bannera da walƙiya a take don kada ka rasa aiki.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Gir-giza idan an sami sabon saƙo (idan ana goyon baya)
Kunna gir-giza na na’ura da faɗakarwa.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Haske allo idan kira ya shigo
Ƙaramin walƙiya mai haske idan ana kira.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Rubuta ta atomatik saƙonnin murya
Haɗa rubutu ga saƙonnin sauti da ka karɓa.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Faɗakarwa na gani don saƙonni & kira
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Nuna bannera da walƙiya a taken allo don kada ka rasa aiki.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Gir-giza a kan sabbin saƙonni (idan ana goyon baya)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Kunna gir-giza na na’ura tare da faɗakarwa.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Ƙaramin walƙiya mai haske idan ana kiran shiga.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Ajiye ciphertext kaɗai a sabar. Yana kashe AI/Fassara da dubawar tsari.

help.title: Taimako
help.cantLogin: Ba za a iya shiga ba

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Nema ta lakabi, suna, sunan mai amfani, ko waya
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Wasu hanyoyi masu sauri don farawa.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Nema ta waya / sunan mai amfani
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Raba hanyar gayyatar ka don fara hira nan da nan.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Kasance da hulɗa a hanya tare da Chatforia don iOS da Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Shawara: Saƙonninka suna daidaituwa a tsakanin yanar gizo da wayar hannu.

randomChat.title: Hira Ta Bazata
randomChat.description: Haɗu da sabon mutum nan take. Za mu dace ku mu buɗe ɗakin hira na wucin gadi.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ana iya ajiye hirar mutum-da-mutum kawai
